description: The vmware compute driver does not support the image filter based on hypervisor_type. In a heterogeneous environment, this filter attribute allows us to provision an instance to a specific hypervisor based on the property of the glance image. The solution is to populate the dictionary 'supported_instances' from the vmware compute driver.
title: Image filter does not work for vmware compute driver

    Fixed image filter support for vmware
    
    The vmware compute driver does not support the image filter
    based on hypervisor_type. In a heterogeneous environment,
    this filter attribute allows us to provision an instance
    to a specific hypervisor based on the property of the
    glance image. The solution is to populate the dictionary
    'supported_instances' from the vmware compute driver.
    
    Fix for bug 1131542
